feed.title: Hayday - News
feed.subtitle: RSS wrapper of Hayday inbox News

entry.title: Hay Day Events Week 28!
entry.content:
Hello farmers! We hope you are enjoying the summer season, It's time for some more Events! All events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Vouchers)

Tuesday: Town Visitors (Silo and Barn Materials)

Wednesday: Boat Event (Boosters)

Thursday: Farm Visitor (2x Coins)

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Duck Salon and Net Maker, 30%) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor Event (2x XP)

Sunday: Crop Boost Event (3 Crops instead of 2, 3 random crops)

Have a great week!

entry.title: Hay Day Events Week 29!
entry.content:
Hay Day Events Week 29!

Hello farmers! Ready for another week of Events? All events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Expansion Materials)

Tuesday: Truck Event (Vouchers)

Wednesday: Boat Event (2x Coins)

Thursday: Farm Visitor (Yard Sale)

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Lobster and Lures 30%) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor Event (Expansion Materials) + Truck Event (2x Coins)

Sunday: Production Building Event (3 random buildings, 20% boost) + Boat Event (2x Coins)

Have a great week!

entry.title: Hay Day Events Week 30!
entry.content:
Hay Day Events Week 30!

Hello farmers! We hope you've been enjoying the Summer Events so far! All events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Puzzle Pieces)

Tuesday: Truck Event (Expansion Materials)

Wednesday: Boat Event (Vouchers)

Thursday: Farm Visitor (2x Coins) + Global Boat Event

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (All 20% Boost) + Global Boat Event + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor (Silo and Barn Materials) + Global Boat Event

Sunday: Animal Feed Event (3 random types of animal feed produced 2x faster) + Global Boat Event

Have a great week!

Sunday: Crops Event (three random crops will yield 3 crops instead of the usual 2).

Have a productive week!

entry.title: Visitor Milestone Info
entry.content:
Green Game Jam Visitor Milestone

In Hay Day, nothing bad ever happens and every meal is a sustainable meal! We are joining Green Game Jam and inviting you to bring some of that sustainability to your real lives and share it with your loved ones.

Right now, our Farm Visitors are giving out extra Coins for all the vegetarian goodies you produce during the Task Event - and we're ready to give you even more rewards!

For the next 7 days, let's come together as a community to serve as many Farm Visitors as we can, earning extra rewards along the way.

Rewards:

  • 20 Million Farm Visitors Served: 2x Screws

  • 40 Million Farm Visitors Served: 2x Marker Stakes

  • 60 Million Farm Visitors Served: 10x Diamonds

  • 80 Million Farm Visitors Served: 1x Pumpkin Gnome

Keep an eye on your inbox to track our progress towards this milestone, and when it's time to collect your rewards, head over to the Shop. You'll find them waiting as free items, just a scroll past the Farm Pass offers.

Together, we can create a positive impact! Good luck!

entry.title: Hay Day Week 40
entry.content:
Hay Day Events Week 40

Hey farmers! Get ready for another week of events! All events & derbies start at 8 AM UTC. Jump into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Vouchers)

Tuesday: Truck Event (x2 XP) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Wednesday: Boat Event (x2 Coins) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Thursday: Production Buildings - (20% boost for 3 buildings) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Friday: Fishing Event - Duck and Net Maker 30% + 3x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Farm Visitor Event (x2 Coins)

Sunday: Crops Event (three random crops will yield 3 crops instead of the usual 2)

Be sure to participate in this week's Normal Derby, starting Tuesday! Have an amazing week!
